ThingDef.label: steel framing
ThingDef.description:
A simple concept: add stronger frames to your androids because circuitry isn't exactly bulletproof.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: plasteel frame coverings
ThingDef.description:
by adding plasteel coverings to weakspots on the android's frame; this simple addition should vastly increase an android's damage resistance.

 Can be installed on 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: composite frame plating
ThingDef.description:
This plating acts just as any other would but with increased damage resistance thanks to it's composite nature.

 Can be installed on 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: hydraulic frame
ThingDef.description:
This kit contains enough components to enhance the framework of an android without causing major rearrangement, increasing carrying capacity by utilising several high power hydraulic pumps. Although strong, they do restrict the user to lesser movements. 

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: hydraulic leg
ThingDef.description:
A tough leg replacement that consists of 2 strong hydraulic pumps, allowing for more carrying capacity, at the expense of agility. 

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: hydraulic arm
ThingDef.description:
A tough arm replacement that consists of 2 strong hydraulic pumps, allowing for more carrying capacity, at the expense of agility.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: mining arm
ThingDef.description:
This "arm" is not much more than a large plasteel tipped drill, used widely during the asteroid rush of the 22nd century. It does a good job in mining but not so much with more intricate operations.

 Can be installed on 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: basic replacement arm
ThingDef.description:
A relatively simple arm that is usually mass produced to cater to entire droid armies on warring planets.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: basic replacement leg
ThingDef.description:
A relatively simple leg that is usually mass produced to cater to entire droid armies on warring planets.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: crude heatsink
ThingDef.description:
A very crude heatsink made form scrap metal roughly arranged into an array.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: crude light sensor
ThingDef.description:
As simple as light detection gets, this diode simply acts as a switch that is either opened or closed depending on whether light reaches it or not.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: crude coolant pump
ThingDef.description:
This coolant pump operates through differential pressure; which isn't a bad mechanism for operation but, the ability for this pump to even hold pressure is questionable.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: crude battery pack
ThingDef.description:
An array of small batteries lined up end-to-end to produce the most voltage. Which unsurprisingly; still isn't a lot.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: crude mechanite storage
ThingDef.description:
A small tank that holds a gel like fluid capable of plugging up holes in mechanisms as it flows through the tubing of the android it is connected to.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: crude bio-reactor
ThingDef.description:
This bio-processor is highly inefficient, only able to obtain energy from the cellulose of organic matter - leaving a lot of what could be gained behind.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: crude power converter
ThingDef.description:
A simple ac / dc converter that only effectively works one way.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit 
 - M.U.F.F Unit

ThingDef.label: high power arm
ThingDef.description:
This extremely tough and strong arm was made to deal with a variety of heavy duty workloads such as construction, warfare or post-distaster rescue.

 Can be installed on 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: high power leg
ThingDef.description:
This model of leg was developed with speed in mind; used majorly by Android Olympic runners from most glitterworlds.

 Can be installed on 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: advanced light sensor
ThingDef.description:
the average human eye and factory standard eyes used for androids are only able to see the visible spectrum of light. This eye model is very different, allowing the host android to switch between infra-red, x-ray and ultraviolet.

 Can be installed on 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: advanced heatsink
ThingDef.description:
This heatsink is composed of multiple layers of materials for maximum heat transfer.

 Can be installed on 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: advanced coolant pump
ThingDef.description:
This coolant pump no longer operates in rhythmic pulses but now allows for continuous injection of coolant under high pressure.

 Can be installed on 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: advanced battery pack
ThingDef.description:
This battery operates under the concept of meshed layers of materials such as gold and plasteel, giving the most electrical output and storage for size.

 Can be installed on 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: advanced mechanite storage
ThingDef.description:
Compared to it's precursor; this mechanism of repair allows for quicker operation and recovery from memetic hazards such as malicious viruses by releasing a swarm of nanites within the coolant of the android it is host to.

 Increases android healing rate by 30% 

 Can be installed on 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: advanced bio-reactor
ThingDef.description:
This bio-processor is able to convert most organic matter into energy at very high efficiency.

 Can be installed on 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: advanced power converter
ThingDef.description:
This power converter is capable of converting and manipulation the properties of electrical signals so effectively that it appears to be magical with insant operation and 99.9% convertion efficiency.

 Can be installed on 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: basic counterweight
ThingDef.description:
This counterweight consists not much more of a large steel ball on the end of a rod.

 Can be installed on 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit

ThingDef.label: advanced counterweight
ThingDef.description:
This counterweight works off gyroscopic principles, giving much higher efficiency.

 Can be installed on 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit

ThingDef.label: crude jaw
ThingDef.description:
This jaw is very flimsy, not very sharp and not very strong either.

 Can be installed on 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit

ThingDef.label: cybernetic jaw
ThingDef.description:
This jaw bolsters an insane level of strength, able to crush a man's skull with ease, you seriously don't want to be on the receiving end of this thing.

 Can be installed on 
 - K9 Cybernetic Unit

ThingDef.label: positronic rewiring
ThingDef.description:
This implant completely overhauls the standard electronic wiring of the artificial brain. Replacing it with higher efficiency positronic wire pathways.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: soldier implant
ThingDef.description:
This implant allows the android to perceive the trajectories of projectiles in real time. Along with the ability to perform war simulations inside their own mind as a secondary function.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: blueprints implant
ThingDef.description:
Allowing the android to store multiple banks of blueprints at once, this helps the android massively with construction.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: tricorder implant
ThingDef.description:
This tricorder has been minified by a factor of ten for fitting within an androids mind. This version allows the android to scan biological creatures and determine a diagnosis with just a glance.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: neural highways
ThingDef.description:
This implant remaps the inner workings of the mind, allowing the formation of "highways" for electronic signals.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Geological implant
ThingDef.description:
This implant when installed; helps an android by overlaying augmented vision of the rock face they are mining from. Showing them real time updates on how to remove rock and material from rock with the highest efficiency.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Engineering implant
ThingDef.description:
This implant when installed; aids an android in all things mechanical, severely increasing android surgery success and mechanoid disassembly efficiency.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Cuisine implant
ThingDef.description:
When installed, this implant will automatically upload information on basic health and safety, along with various cooking techniques. Used widely in glitterworld restaurants for VIP Guests.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Charisma implant
ThingDef.description:
Whether you simply want your androids to be more sociable or for a doctor to have better bedside manner, this implant will help. Allowing an android to more easily notice micro emotions in voices and body language. 

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Negotiator implant
ThingDef.description:
Installed mandatorily onto bodyguard androids and specialist police force androids. This implant aids in negotiation techniques through a wide range of scenarios, whether they be: interrogation or simple trading. This implant was made quite infamous through use in "Connor" model androids. 

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Zoology implant
ThingDef.description:
A simple implant that aids any androids in the ability to control and tame animals by being able to notice the animalistic emotions of most creatures in much more depth. 

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Agricultural implant
ThingDef.description:
This implant adds an augmented view to any android's sight that helps in argiculture hugely, overlaying a special UI that displays the minerals in the soil and health of crops through the use of several spectrographic scans emitted from the orbit of the eye. 

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Basic labor chip
ThingDef.description:
A basic labor chip; the standard for most factory androids, it will teach the android several new ways of performing tasks in a much quicker, more efficient fashion.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Evolving AI Upgrade
ThingDef.description:
This implant allows the current AI to evolve on itself. Over time - this pawn will slowly become more and more mentally complex. Reaching peak efficiency in all it does.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic arm
ThingDef.description:
This arm uses Ultraweave composites developed by only the most advanced glitterworld societies to produce an extremely strong and durable upgrade.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: Cybernetic leg
ThingDef.description:
This leg upgrade is rarely seen outside of the lab, its immense speed and strength boost allows the user to easily lift weights and move at breakneck speeds.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: archotech heatsink
ThingDef.description:
this modified advanced heatsink is made using materials that effectively radiate heat at almost 99% efficiency, practically shooting heat out.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: archotech light sensor
ThingDef.description:
This eye will allow the user to switch their vision between the 3 dimensions they live in and the 4th dimension, this allows them to easily predict movement patterns in real time with pinpoint accuracy as they are practically able to see future events before they occur.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: archotech coolant pump
ThingDef.description:
This coolant injector allows for a much higher coolant temperature range, Able to operate even at near absolute zero temperatures.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: archotech battery pack
ThingDef.description:
In an attempt to recreate Vanometric power generation, this battery cell somewhat achieves that. Boasting far increased charge capacity than that of its precursors.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: archotech mechanite storage
ThingDef.description:
This compartment of archotech nanites is somewhat mis-understood by even the most advanced cultures. What is known however is that it works well as a repair disperal unit, very very well.

 Increases android healing rate by 60% 

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: archotech bio-reactor
ThingDef.description:
Making other forms of mechanical digestion look primitive, this reactor converts consumed material on the molecular level, increasing efficiency twofold.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: archotech power converter
ThingDef.description:
A highly advanced power converter that is able to transfer around the body at 100% efficiency due to its zero-point energy properties.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: crude hearing sensor
ThingDef.description:
This hearing sensor simply acts as a basic interpretation implant, allowing for the translation of only the most basic sounds.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: advanced hearing sensor
ThingDef.description:
This hearing sensor is accurate up to a kilometer. Making it very useful when picking up the faintest of sounds.

 Can be installed on 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: archotech hearing sensor
ThingDef.description:
This sensor is the state of the line in sound detection, able to detect all frequencies of sound. It has potentially unlimited detection.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: advanced smelling sensor
ThingDef.description:
The widened openings on this smell sensor not only allow for the detection of odor but also increases ventilation.

 Can be installed on 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: crude smelling sensor
ThingDef.description:
This smelling smell simply acts as a basic interpretation implant, allowing for the translation of only the most basic smells and a marginal ventilation increase.

 Can be installed on 
 - T1 Androids 
 - T2 Androids 
 - T3 Androids 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids

ThingDef.label: archotech smelling sensor
ThingDef.description:
This sensor is the state of the line in smell detection, able to detect all ranges of smell. It has potentially unlimited detection. The mechanisms inside also greatly increase ventilation and air flow.

 Can be installed on 
 - T4 Androids 
 - T5 Androids
